NewsArticle.Title: Reset Notes
NewsArticle.Content: Reset Notes - VDay Bonus Exp-Ap(x10) * After removing recently duplicated items, "VDay Bonus Exp-Ap(x10)" is once again tradeable - Arena Trinket * Arena Trinket has been updated. (Please contact us if you are an Arena Host and have not received it after the reset.) - Upcoming Events * Halloween Events (next week) Dark Ages Team
